meta.name: Zenith Grammar
meta.description: Grammar rules for writing Zenith code in a human-first, indentation-based style

symbols./: Starts a new element. Must be followed by a valid element name from the dictionary.
symbols.\"\": Wraps string content for text-based elements.
symbols.::: Optional inline content or attribute override for elements.

notes: All elements start with '/' followed by a valid element name from the dictionary.
Text content must be wrapped in quotes.
Nesting is determined by indentation only; braces '{}' are not used.
:: is optional inline content or attribute override for elements.
Visual dividers are not used; structure is determined solely by elements and indentation.
